synopsis.text: Snooze alarms, sunbeams, and the daily skirmish between the allure of sleep and the call of the day: this is the battleground for our protagonist in this captivating short anime film. The story unfolds around an everyday young man who finds himself locked in a relatable yet surreal struggle to remain in the comfort of his bed on a radiant morning. In this dreamlike war, ordinary objects like alarm clocks seem to spring to life, adding to the whimsical chaos. Follow this young man's humorous and endearing journey as he navigates the challenges of waking up in the morning.
